question: Who has been sworn-in as new president of Brazil?
explanation: On 1st January 2019, Jair Bolsonaro has been sworn-in as new president of Brazil for a four-year term.  He is a member of the Social Liberal Party (PSL) and succeeded Michel Temer. Bolsonaro won the presidential election by a wide margin against Fernando Haddad of the left-wing Workers Party on 28 October 2018.
